kannada_original: ರಚಿಸೊಂದು ಪುಟ್ಟ ಪಟ ; ಕಟ್ಟು ಚೆಲು ಕುಚೊಂದ ;
english_transliteration: Racisondu puṭṭa paṭa; kaṭṭu celu kuconda;
english_translation: Construct a small kite; tie a beautiful tassel;
Let the kite fly in the sky.

kannada_original: ಇದೆ ದಾರ ಕರದಲ್ಲಿ; ಗಾಳಿ ಯಾರದೊ ಏನೊ !
english_transliteration: Ide dāra karadalli; gāḷi yāradō ēnō!
english_translation: The string is in your hand; whose is the wind, what is it!
Only this much is called yours! – Muddu Rāma.
